data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Actually, never mind the "SDP" name. I mapped out the system a few
    weeks ago and it logically divided itself into two subsystems,
    SDP::Parser and SDP::Generator. I started work on them soon after,
    and they're currently in their alpha stages.

    The back end for both the parser and generator is written in C and
    distributed together via SourceForge:
    http://sourceforge.net/projects/sinistersdp/.
